review: Easy to connect and works fine.  I use my tv remote for sound.
author: B

review: It works great and it's fast
author: Leonte Guerra

review: Excellent ! Just one problem, at times it is really slow when it comes to switching apps and what not.
author: NAT

review: I can't give 5-star because I cannot not stream movies due to low bandwidth issues. I have not figured out how to correct so I will probably cancel membership at the end of the trial period if I have not figured it out by then. I think the Stick works fine but unhappy with the streaming.
author: lambsche

review: Easy to install. Functionality is straight forward and good; I don't care for a lot of bells and whistles.  I looked at Roku.and for a lot less, this has the basic features I was looking for at a considerably lower price.
author: C. Barry E. Sloane "CBES"

review: A most useable tool! Watched several movies and series programs. Found the music channels to be be very good.Well worth the price.Shipping costs are great as well.Thanks Amazon, keep up the good work.
author: Kindle Customer
